name: Spod Racer
overview: It's a Destruction Derby in 2D RGB that sparkles. Initially, you will have to choose the number of players from six offered. For each of them, you can determine if it will be played by the computer or by a human, in which case you will choose the control mode (gamepad 1, gamepad 2, keyboard...). Hey there, let's go! You will soon find yourself in RGB circuits. Each game is played in six rounds by default (so six playing areas), where the goal is to stay last on the track: you can settle from one to twenty rounds. The principle consists of colliding with the other competitors to make them suffer damage and get them out of the playing area. When a vehicle explodes for example, the flickering of the screen is intense and may not be suitable for gamers with sensitivity to flashing lights.
